code-runner.executorMapByGlob.main.c: cd $dir && gcc -g -Wall -o curl -lcurl -ljson-c main.c util.c models/client.c models/channel.c && ./curl

code-runner.executorMapByFileExtension..c: cd $workspace && gcc -o curl -I/usr/local/Cellar/curl/7.75.0/include/curl/ -L/usr/local/Cellar/curl/7.57.0/lib -ljson-c main.c util.c models/client.c models/channel.c && ./curl
